url.description: Most authoritative URL where more information about the appearance can be found

type.description: Type of appearance (e.g., podcast, tv-show, interview, etc.)

date.description: Date of the appearance in YYYY-MM-DD format.

organizer_name.description: Name of the organizer or host. If unknown, return '''Organizer unknown.'''

other_participated_people_mentioned.description: Comma-separated list of other people mentioned as participants.

summary.description: Up to 1 paragraph explaining the appearance.

title.description: Concise title of the appearance, max 12 words
